It is characterized by its compact growth habit and intricate floral structure, with flowers that are often pale yellow or greenish-white. The plant produces pseudobulbs that store water and nutrients, enabling it to survive in its arid or semi-arid habitat. Its leaves are typically narrow and革质 (leathery), adapted to reduce water loss.
